connecting.title: Connecting to Dirigera
connecting.information1: Homey is trying to connect to your IKEA Dirigera Hub. Please wait!

authenticate.title: Authenticate with hub
authenticate.information1: Please press the Action-button on the back of your Dirigera Hub

authresult.title: Successfully authenticated
authresult.information1: Homey is now authenticated with the IKEA Dirigera Hub and the device has been added to Homey
